import React, {useState} from 'react' import {BrowserRouter, Route} from "react-router-dom"; import NewsDetail from "./newsDetail"; const NewsList = () => { const [ title, setTitle ]= useState("") const [ summary, setSummary ] = useState("") const [ keyword, setKeyword ] = useState("") const [ regDate, setRegDate] = useState("") const moveToDetail = e => { return<> } return <>
NEWS TITLE
SUMMARY
{title}
{summary}
{keyword}
{/*키워드 컬러 지정 : text-cyan-100*/}
{regDate}
NEWS TITLE
SUMMARY
KEYWORD
DATE
NEWS TITLE
SUMMARY
KEYWORD
DATE
NEWS TITLE
SUMMARY
KEYWORD
DATE
NEWS TITLE
SUMMARY

DATE
} export default NewsList
